directions: In a large pot over medium heat, combine broth, broccoli, onion, carrots and bay leaf.  Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer until vegetables are tender.  Remove bay leaf.  (At this point, you may remove the broccoli stalks, carrots and onion and puree in a food processor, then return them to the pot, if desired.)
Stir in the cheese until melted.  Adjust seasonings.  Stir in half-and-half and heat through.
title: Cream of Broccoli Cheese Soup II
